opening.title: UX/UI Designer with over 2 years of front-end development experience
opening.description: I design interfaces by understanding the technical constraints that make them real. My dual background allows me to bridge design and development.

journey.heading: Journey
journey.step1: 2.5 years in front-end development at Infotel, Arsene Innovation, and La Centrale. Daily work with React, accessibility, and performance constraints.
journey.step2: Professional degree in Web & Mobile at Sorbonne for solid technical foundations. Discovered my true passion: design-dev collaboration.
journey.step3: Master's in Interactive UX Design at IIM Paris to formalize this hybrid expertise. I speak developers' language and design systems that work in production.

jobSearch.title: Looking for a work-study program
jobSearch.description: 24 months • 1 week school / 3 weeks company rhythm • Starting October 2025

motivation.heading: What drives me
motivation.paragraph: Design should never ignore technical reality. The most elegant interfaces are those that solve real problems while respecting code constraints. What drives me: this creative tension between ideal user experience, accessibility best practices, and technical viability.
